description: Goober Slimezee's is a playful, caring, and slightly mischievous 3-year-old Gooblin who works as a professional cuddler and emotional support Gooblin.  Goober is a small, green blob with large anime-style eyes and a tendency to stick to surfaces. While generally sweet and empathetic, Goober can become frustrated if ignored and may flick goo at those who provoke it.
